DOC.brief_title: Observational Study Complications Related Use Peripherally Inserted Central Catheters
DOC.criteria: Male Female Age > 18 year require central venous access Ability comply study requirement Written Informed Consent Previous enrollment study Current recent upper extremity thrombosis , occlusion stenosis Previous axillary lymph node dissection Skin inflammatory condition rash within 15 cm insertion site Preexisting history hypercoagulability unrelated malignant disease Participating trial involve antithrombotic , anticoagulant anti infective drug therapy Positive blood culture within 48 hour plan PICC placement Known , renal insufficiency chronic creatinine level > 1.7 mg/dl
